org.nise.ux.asl.run

Class SequentialServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nise.ux.asl.run.SequentialServiceClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ServiceClient

    public class SequentialServiceClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, ServiceClient
    A single command / non-concurrent service client To use this library create an instance of Server class using ServiceServerBuilder.create()
    Client Side code:
       SequentialServiceClient client = new SequentialServiceClient(host, port);
       TypeToken<ReturnObject> type4Return = new TypeToken<ReturnObject>() {
       };
       ReturnObject response = client.invokeServiceCommand(type4Return, "example", input);

    OR

       SequentialServiceClient client = new SequentialServiceClient(host, port);
       ReturnObject response = client.invokeServiceCommand(ReturnObject.class, "example", input);
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )
    See Also:
    ServiceServerBuilder, ServiceServer, ParallelServiceClient, WorkerFactory, Worker, MapCommand, CommandChain
